name: Cuthulu ate my freinds
description:
My first game(and project) in java and my first game jam submission, its very rought around the edges and there are a few rendering bugs that I cant repair without a complete rewrite.

the phiysics glitch every so often

assets are crude never really been an arty person 

I look forward to trying again next year, hopefully with a better engine and a better idea.
